rule-22-4-a.test_description: Baseline building has two zones.  HVAC is system type 7 and is correctly modeled with outdoor air reset for CHW loop supply temperature control.  Expected result: PASS

standard.rule_description: For baseline chilled water loop that is not purchased chilled water and does not serve any computer room HVAC systems, chilled-water supply temperature shall be reset using the following schedule: 44F at outdoor dry-bulb temperature of 80F and above, 54F at 60F and below, and ramped linearly between 44F and 54F at temperature between 80F and 60F.

standard.rule_description: The baseline building design’s chiller plant shall be modeled with chillers having the type as indicated in Table G3.1.3.7 as a function of building peak cooling load.

rule-22-22-e.test_description: Baseline building has one zone.  HVAC is system type 2 and does not have a chilled water system.  Expected result: Not Applicable

rule-22-23-a.test_description: Baseline building has two zones.  HVAC is system type 7 and is correctly modeled with the is_chilled_water_pump_interlocked set to true  and one pump per chiller.  Expected result: PASS

standard.rule_description: Each baseline chiller shall be modeled with separate chilled water pump interlocked to operate with the associated chiller.

standard.rule_description: Each baseline chiller shall be modeled with separate chilled water pump interlocked to operate with the associated chiller.

rule-22-23-c.test_description: Baseline building has two zones.  HVAC is system type 7 and is incorrectly modeled with two chillers and only one pump.  The is_chilled_water_pump_interlocked set to true for both chillers.  Expected result: FAIL

standard.rule_description: Each baseline chiller shall be modeled with separate chilled water pump interlocked to operate with the associated chiller.

rule-22-40-a.test_description: Building has two zones.  Purchased chilled water is modeled in both the proposed and baseline systems for building utilizing system 7c.  Expected result: PASS

standard.rule_description: For systems using purchased chilled water, the cooling source shall be modeled based on G3.1.1.3 as purchased chilled water in both the proposed design and baseline building design. On-site chillers and direct expansion equipment shall not be modeled in the baseline building design.

rule-22-40-b.test_description: Building has two zones.  Purchased chilled water is modeled in the proposed model, but baseline uses a CHW plant (system 7).  Expected result: FAIL

standard.rule_description: For systems using purchased chilled water, the cooling source shall be modeled based on G3.1.1.3 as purchased chilled water in both the proposed design and baseline building design. On-site chillers and direct expansion equipment shall not be modeled in the baseline building design.

rule-22-40-c.test_description: Building has one zone.  Purchased chilled water is modeled in both the proposed and baseline systems for building utilizing system 1c.  Expected result: PASS

standard.rule_description: For systems using purchased chilled water, the cooling source shall be modeled based on G3.1.1.3 as purchased chilled water in both the proposed design and baseline building design. On-site chillers and direct expansion equipment shall not be modeled in the baseline building design.

rule-22-40-d.test_description: Building has one zone.  Purchased chilled water is modeled in the proposed model, but baseline uses DX cooling (system 1).  Expected result: FAIL

standard.rule_description: For systems using purchased chilled water, the cooling source shall be modeled based on G3.1.1.3 as purchased chilled water in both the proposed design and baseline building design. On-site chillers and direct expansion equipment shall not be modeled in the baseline building design.

rule-22-40-e.test_description: Building has one zone.  Purchased chilled water is not modeled in the proposed model.  Both proposed and beaseline are modeled with system type 2.  Expected result: Not Applicable

standard.rule_description: For systems using purchased chilled water, the cooling source shall be modeled based on G3.1.1.3 as purchased chilled water in both the proposed design and baseline building design. On-site chillers and direct expansion equipment shall not be modeled in the baseline building design.
